targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__time(date),
  battery_level AS "SOC [%]",
  (CASE WHEN charger_phases >= 1
        THEN (CASE WHEN charger_phases = 2 THEN 3
                   WHEN charger_phases = 1 THEN 1
                   ELSE 0 END
              ) * charger_actual_current * charger_voltage / 1000.0
        ELSE charger_power END) AS "Power [kW]",
  (CASE WHEN charger_voltage > 2
        THEN charger_actual_current
        ELSE ((2.85 + (usable_battery_level * 0.013)) * 96) * charger_power / 100
   END) AS "Current [A]",
  (CASE WHEN charger_voltage > 2
        THEN charger_voltage
        ELSE charger_power /
             GREATEST(0.1, (((2.85 + (usable_battery_level * 0.013)) * 96.0)
                             * charger_power / 100.0)
             ) * 1000.0
   END) AS "Voltage [V]",
  (CASE WHEN battery_heater_on OR battery_heater THEN 10 ELSE 0 END) AS "Battery heater"
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE (date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000) AND date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000))
  AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  coalesce(cp_added, c_added) AS "Added"
FROM (SELECT cp.charge_energy_added AS cp_added from charging_processes cp where id = $charging_processes) cp
CROSS JOIN (SELECT max(charge_energy_added) AS c_added FROM charges WHERE charging_process_id=$charging_processes) c

SELECT  charge_energy_used AS "Used"
FROM  charging_processes where id = $charging_processes

SELECT  CASE WHEN charge_energy_used IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE LEAST(charge_energy_added / NULLIF(charge_energy_used, 0), 1.0) * 100 END AS "Efficiency"
FROM  charging_processes where id = $charging_processes

SELECT COALESCE(g.name, CONCAT_WS(', ', COALESCE(addresses.name, CONCAT_WS(' ', addresses.road, addresses.house_number)), addresses.city)) FROM 	charging_processes c 	LEFT JOIN addresses ON addresses.id = c.address_id 	LEFT JOIN geofences g ON g.id = geofence_id WHERE 	c.id = $charging_processes

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  latitude,
  longitude
FROM positions
WHERE 
  car_id = $car_id AND 
  (date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000) AND date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000))
ORDER BY 
  date ASC

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  (CASE WHEN charger_phases >= 1
        THEN (CASE WHEN charger_phases = 2 THEN 3
                   WHEN charger_phases = 1 THEN 1
                   ELSE 0 END
              ) * charger_actual_current * charger_voltage / 1000.0
        ELSE charger_power END) AS "Power",
  (CASE WHEN charger_voltage > 2
        THEN charger_actual_current
        ELSE ((2.85 + (usable_battery_level * 0.013)) * 96) * charger_power / 100
   END) AS "Current",
  (CASE WHEN charger_voltage > 2
        THEN charger_voltage
        ELSE charger_power /
             GREATEST(0.1, (((2.85 + (usable_battery_level * 0.013)) * 96.0)
                             * charger_power / 100.0)
             ) * 1000.0
   END) AS "Voltage"
  
FROM charges c
JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id
WHERE (date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000) AND date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000))
  AND p.car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY 1
SELECT battery_level as "Start" FROM charges 	where charging_process_id=$charging_processes 	ORDER BY DATE ASC 	LIMIT 1

SELECT battery_level - (SELECT battery_level as "Added" FROM charges where charging_process_id=$charging_processes	ORDER BY DATE ASC 	LIMIT 1) as "Added" FROM charges c join charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id WHERE (date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000) AND date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000)) AND p.car_id = $car_id ORDER BY c.ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT battery_level as "End" FROM charges c join charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id WHERE (date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000) AND date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000)) AND p.car_id = $car_id ORDER BY c.ID DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT MIN(convert_km(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km, '$length_unit')) as start_$length_unit
FROM charges WHERE charging_process_id = $charging_processes

SELECT ROUND(convert_km(end_range - start_range, '$length_unit'),0) as added_$length_unit 
FROM
(SELECT MIN(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km) as start_range
FROM charges WHERE charging_process_id = $charging_processes) s
CROSS JOIN (
SELECT MAX(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km) as  end_range 
FROM charges WHERE charging_process_id = $charging_processes) e

SELECT MAX(convert_km(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km, '$length_unit')) as  current_$length_unit 
FROM charges WHERE charging_process_id = $charging_processes

SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (end_date - start_date)) AS "Elapsed" FROM 
  (SELECT min(date) as start_date FROM charges where charging_process_id=$charging_processes) s
  CROSS JOIN 
  (SELECT max(date) as end_date FROM charges where charging_process_id=$charging_processes) e

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval), avg(convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit')) as outdoor_$temp_unit FROM charges WHERE charging_process_id = $charging_processes AND (date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000) AND date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval), avg(convert_celsius(inside_temp, '$temp_unit')) AS inside_$temp_unit FROM positions WHERE car_id = $car_id and inside_temp is not null AND (date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000) AND date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

SELECT 	$__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval), 	avg(convert_celsius(driver_temp_setting, '$temp_unit')) as driver_$temp_unit FROM positions WHERE driver_temp_setting IS NOT NULL AND car_id = $car_id AND (date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000) AND date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000)) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

SELECT
    convert_km(p.odometer::numeric, '$length_unit') AS odometer
FROM
    charging_processes cp
LEFT JOIN positions p ON p.id = cp.position_id
WHERE 
    cp.car_id = $car_id
    AND start_date >= to_timestamp(${current_charge_time} / 1000)
    AND start_date <= to_timestamp(${current_end_time} / 1000);

list.definition:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC;

list.name: BatteryCapacity
list.query:
WITH Aux AS
(SELECT car_id,
		COALESCE(efficiency, 
		(SELECT efficiency
			FROM cars WHERE id = $car_id) * 100) AS efficiency
	FROM (
		SELECT ROUND((charge_energy_added / NULLIF(end_rated_range_km - start_rated_range_km, 0))::numeric, 3) * 100 as efficiency,
			COUNT(*) as count, $car_id AS car_id 
		FROM charging_processes
		WHERE car_id = $car_id
			AND duration_min > 10
			AND end_battery_level <= 95
			AND start_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
			AND end_rated_range_km IS NOT NULL
			AND charge_energy_added > 0
		GROUP BY 1
		ORDER BY 2 DESC
		LIMIT 1
	) AS DerivatedEfficiency
),
CurrentCapacity	 AS
(SELECT AVG(Capacity) AS CurrentCapacity 
FROM (
SELECT 
	c.${preferred_range}_battery_range_km * aux.efficiency / c.usable_battery_level AS Capacity 
	FROM charging_processes cp
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id 
                INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.efficiency
		AND c.usable_battery_level > 0
	 ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC, c.date DESC LIMIT 100) AS lastCharges
)
SELECT CurrentCapacity FROM CurrentCapacity

list.definition: SELECT (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts FROM charging_processes WHERE id = $charging_processes
list.name: current_charge_time
list.query: SELECT (round(extract(epoch FROM start_date) - 10) * 1000) AS start_date_ts FROM charging_processes WHERE id = $charging_processes

list.definition:
SELECT
    id AS __value,
    TO_CHAR((start_date AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Shanghai', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')|| '   ' || (
        SELECT COALESCE(
            g.name, 
            CONCAT_WS(
                ', ', 
                COALESCE(addresses.name, CONCAT_WS(' ', addresses.road, addresses.house_number)),
                addresses.city
            )
        )
        FROM addresses
        LEFT JOIN geofences g ON g.id = charging_processes.geofence_id
        WHERE addresses.id = charging_processes.address_id
    ) AS __text
FROM charging_processes
WHERE car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY start_date DESC;
list.label: Charge
list.name: charging_processes
list.query:
SELECT
    id AS __value,
    TO_CHAR((start_date AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Shanghai', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')|| '   ' || (
        SELECT COALESCE(
            g.name, 
            CONCAT_WS(
                ', ', 
                COALESCE(addresses.name, CONCAT_WS(' ', addresses.road, addresses.house_number)),
                addresses.city
            )
        )
        FROM addresses
        LEFT JOIN geofences g ON g.id = charging_processes.geofence_id
        WHERE addresses.id = charging_processes.address_id
    ) AS __text
FROM charging_processes
WHERE car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY start_date DESC;

list.definition: SELECT CAST(extract(epoch FROM COALESCE(end_date, now())) * 1000 AS BIGINT) AS end_ms FROM charging_processes WHERE id = $charging_processes
list.name: current_end_time
list.query: SELECT CAST(extract(epoch FROM COALESCE(end_date, now())) * 1000 AS BIGINT) AS end_ms FROM charging_processes WHERE id = $charging_processes
